dataflowSinks.name: UserQuerypowerds
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Name as string,
		Category as string,
		Status as string,
		Error as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UserQuerypowerds

scriptLines: customerdata, peopleData, productsData union(byName: true)~> union1

sources.name: empDataset
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empDataset

sources.name: newemployee
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> newemployee
